API name: MSC GeoMet Climate RPC API v1.3.0
Description: The Canadian Centre for Climate Services (CCCS) is an important part of the Pan-Canadian Framework on Clean Growth and Climate Change. The CCCS will be the official source of reliable climate information, data, and tools from the Government of Canada, and will provide training and user support to help increase climate resilience across Canada. Get data about snow depth, precipitation changes, projected mean temperature, projected minimum temperature and other information about geographical areas with this API.
